languages.text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, персонаж также атакует все цели в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг основной цели.

traits.locale_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the wielder also attacks all targets in a 4-cell radius around the target.
Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from its wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

languages.text: Враги, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}пораженные{/g} этим ружьем, получают на {uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% больше урона от атак персонажа до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from its wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Враги, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}пораженные{/g} этим ружьем, получают на {uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% больше урона от атак персонажа до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.
Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим оружием, персонаж также атакует все цели в радиусе 4 клеток вокруг основной цели.
Враги, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}пораженные{/g} этим ружьем, получают на {uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% больше урона от атак персонажа до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: 被这把步枪{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人后续再次被装备者命中时，受到的伤害提高{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}%。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 被这把步枪{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人后续再次被装备者命中时，受到的伤害提高{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}%。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}された敵は、戦闘終了まで、使用者から受けるダメージが+{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}%増加する。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from its wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}された敵は、戦闘終了まで、使用者から受けるダメージが+{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}%増加する。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por este rifle sufren un +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} % de daño adicional del portador hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por este rifle sufren un +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} % de daño adicional del portador hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Si {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} con esta arma, el portador también ataca a todos los objetivos en un radio de 4 casillas del objetivo.

languages.text: Mit diesem Gewehr {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Gegner erleiden durch den Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} % mehr Schaden. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Mit diesem Gewehr {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Gegner erleiden durch den Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} % mehr Schaden. Nicht stapelbar.

languages.text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par ce fusil subissent +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} % de dégâts supplémentaires lorsque son utilisateur les attaque jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par ce fusil subissent +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} % de dégâts supplémentaires lorsque son utilisateur les attaque jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Bu tüfekle {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} düşmanlar, silahı kullanan kişinin yapacağı saldırılardan +%{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} daha fazla hasar alır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Bu silahı kullanan kişi, başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşta{/g} hedefin en fazla 4 hücre uzağında bulunan düşmanlara da saldırır.

Bu tüfekle {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} düşmanlar, silahı kullanan kişinin yapacağı saldırılardan +%{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab} daha fazla hasar alır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
